Clone Git Repository
====================

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

Clone our `project repository <https://github.com/CGAT-Group/DICAST>`_ to a directory of your choice:

.. prompt:: bash

	git clone https://github.com/CGAT-Group/DICAST.git

This will give you access to the necessary scripts and the example :doc:`folder structure <input>` called sample_input.
